SELECT (@rowNo:=@rowNo + 1) AS rowNo, t001.employeeNo, concat_ws(" ",t001.employeeFristName,t001.employeeLastName) as employeeName, t007.customerName, m013.stationName, concat_ws("-",t006.payOffRange1,t006.payOffRange2) as payOffRange, wtt.sumWorkTime workTime, concat("￥",FORMAT(if(wtt.sumWorkTime>t006.payOffRange2,t005.salary/t006.payOffRange2*(wtt.sumWorkTime-t006.payOffRange2),if(t006.payOffRange1>wtt.sumWorkTime,t005.salary/t006.payOffRange1*(wtt.sumWorkTime-t006.payOffRange1),0)),0))overTimePay, if(ewt.employeeWorkTimeHaveData=1,' アップロード',if(wtt.attendanceRegisterFlag=1,' 時間登録',''))checkSection, ewt.updateTime, if(wtt.approvalStatus=1,"済み","未")approvalStatus FROM T001Employee as t001 left join T005WagesInfo as t005 on t001.employeeNo=t005.employeeNo left join T006EmployeeSiteInfo as t006 on t001.employeeNo=t006.employeeNo left join T007CustomerInfo as t007 on t006.customerNo=t007.customerNo left join M013Station as m013 on t007.stationCode=m013.stationCode left join (SELECT employeeNo,updateTime,yearAndMonth,1 as employeeWorkTimeHaveData FROM employeeWorkTime group by employeeNo)ewt on t001.employeeNo=ewt.employeeNo left join workTotalTime as wtt on t001.employeeNo=wtt.employeeNo and ewt.yearAndMonth=wtt.attendanceYearAndMonth ,(SELECT @rowNo:=0) AS rowNo WHERE ewt.yearAndMonth = #{yearAndMonth}
and wtt.approvalStatus!=1
and wtt.approvalStatus=1
and wtt.sumWorkTime>0
and ewt.employeeWorkTimeHaveData=1
